title: Short-term Workshop for Developing Technology-mediated Intercultural Competencies for Pre-service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational understanding of primary education curricula
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, including short-term intensive courses for pre-service teachers emphasizing smartphone-based cultural exchange activities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze educational videos from diverse cultural backgrounds and explain at least three cultural differences
Learners can collaborate with pre-service teachers from different cultural backgrounds to produce at least one joint project using online collaboration tools
Learners can perform reflective journaling based on intercultural interaction experiences and write at least 500 characters of self-reflection

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
